text: @RahulGandhi Covering face with a cloth is enough. The cost of a soap is around Rs. 5 and testing of COVID-19 is free. Medicines are provided for free. So are u asking to remove GST when mostly everything is paid by gov?@PMOIndia @anjanaomkashyap @RubikaLiyaquat @ABPNews @aajtak @BeingAadi99
